brand_info.name: Urban Threadz
brand_info.mission: Sustainable streetwear for the modern creator.
brand_info.return_policy: 30-day returns on unworn items with tags. Free return shipping for orders over $100.
brand_info.shipping_time: Standard: 3-5 business days. Express: 1-2 business days.

products.name: Midnight Oversized Hoodie
